financial-services.title: Financial Services
financial-services.description: AI-powered fraud detection, decision support, RegTech, and wealth management.

hero.title: AI That Passes the Audit.
hero.subtitle: Transform operations while maintaining compliance, control, and competitive edge.

challenge.title: The Financial Services Paradox
points: 75% of GenAI pilots in banking never scale.
Legacy systems lock up nearly 80% of IT budgets.
Competitive pressures mount while risk frameworks tighten.
You need AI-driven innovation without sacrificing audit-readiness.

solutionsHub.title: AI-Powered Fraud Detection & Prevention
solutionsHub.benefits: 40% reduction in fraud investigation time, real-time anomaly detection, reduced false positives.
solutionsHub.useCases: Payment fraud, account takeover, wire transfer monitoring, cross-channel correlation.

solutionsHub.title: Intelligent Customer Service & Analytics
solutionsHub.benefits: 60% reduction in resolution time, predictive churn, personalized engagement.
solutionsHub.useCases: Intelligent chatbots, predictive dashboards, sentiment analysis, cross-sell optimization.

solutionsHub.title: RegTech & Compliance Automation
solutionsHub.benefits: Real-time regulatory monitoring, automated reporting, reduced audit time.
solutionsHub.useCases: Regulatory monitoring, policy enforcement, compliance reporting, risk assessment.

solutionsHub.title: Trade & Risk Intelligence
solutionsHub.benefits: Faster risk assessment, improved decision support, scenario modeling.
solutionsHub.useCases: Quantitative modeling, market intelligence, trade surveillance, portfolio optimization.

solutionsHub.title: Wealth Management Personalization
solutionsHub.benefits: Personalized strategies, improved retention, faster onboarding.
solutionsHub.useCases: Robo-advisory, propensity modeling, portfolio rebalancing, KYC/AML automation.

solutionsHub.title: Data Governance & Architecture Modernization
solutionsHub.benefits: Unified data view, regulatory compliance, foundation for AI.
solutionsHub.useCases: Data lakes, master data management, data lineage, governance automation.

industrials.title: Industrials
industrials.description: Demand forecasting, predictive maintenance, and supply chain optimization.

hero.title: Your Supply Chain Sees Around Corners.
hero.subtitle: Demand forecasting, predictive maintenance, and autonomous coordination.

challenge.title: Industrial Enterprises Demand Intelligent Systems
points: Supply chain disruptions cascade without visibility.
Reactive maintenance drains budgets and disrupts production.
Manual coordination across factories and suppliers is inefficient.
You need systems that anticipate demand, prevent failures, and coordinate autonomously.

solutionsHub.title: Demand Forecasting & Planning
solutionsHub.benefits: 35% improvement in forecast accuracy, inventory optimization, cost reduction.
solutionsHub.useCases: Demand sensing, production planning, inventory optimization, pricing.

solutionsHub.title: Predictive Maintenance & IoT
solutionsHub.benefits: 30-40% reduction in downtime, planned maintenance, extended asset life.
solutionsHub.useCases: Equipment monitoring, failure prediction, maintenance scheduling.
solutionsHub.businessImpact: Reduced unplanned downtime, extended equipment life.

solutionsHub.title: Supply Chain Optimization
solutionsHub.benefits: Visibility across network, risk identification, cost optimization.
solutionsHub.useCases: Supplier optimization, logistics planning, risk monitoring.

solutionsHub.title: Manufacturing Operations
solutionsHub.benefits: Production efficiency, quality enhancement, cost reduction.
solutionsHub.useCases: Production scheduling, quality control, asset utilization.
solutionsHub.businessImpact: Higher throughput, better quality, lower costs.

solutionsHub.title: Agentic Automation & Orchestration
solutionsHub.benefits: Faster decision cycles, 24/7 coordination, human oversight.
solutionsHub.useCases: Supply chain orchestration, dynamic resource allocation, cross-functional coordination.
